name: Platter
description:
You need to complete the preparation of the ingredients on the left, and the AI has to complete the ones on the right.

You can add an ingredient onto the platter by clicking on it (you can only add the ones on the bottom), and the AI will add ingredients as well.

To validate a recipe, you need to click on your bell (bottom left). Be careful, the AI might validate a recipe before you!

Every 5 points, the difficulty increases.

Phew, that was a lot of backend work! I didn't have the time to add sound unfortunately, but at least I have a working recipe/ingredients system, and a basic (pretty dumb actually after testing) AI.

It took me exactly 3 hours (I forced myself to stop at the 3h mark), but I spend quite a long time figuring out how to compile python with pyinstaller for windows and linux. It finally works!

Enjoy!
